result.markdown:
# 常用操作

## 赋值






::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
a<-1
a
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 1
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
b=2 #不推荐，避免用等号
b
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 2
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
3->c #不常用
c
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 3
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
assign('d',4) #高级用法
d
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 4
```


:::
:::






## <-和=的区别

在 R 语言中，`<-` 和 `=` 都可以用来赋值，但它们之间还是有一些区别的。

-   `<-`: 这是 R 语言中最常用的赋值操作符。它用来将右侧的值赋给左侧的变量。例如，`x <- 5` 表示将 5 赋给变量 `x`。
-   `=`: 这是 R 语言中次常用的赋值操作符。它的语法与 `<-` 类似，也用来将右侧的值赋给左侧的变量。例如，`x = 5` 也表示将 5 赋给变量 `x`。

在实际使用中，`<-` 和 `=` 的区别主要在于语义上的差异。通常来说，`<-` 操作符更加符合人类的思维方式，因为它更加形象地表达了赋值的意义（即将值从右向左流动）。而 `=` 操作符则更像是一个等号，表示变量与值相等。建议使用 `<-` 操作符进行赋值，这样能够更好地保持统一，并且能够更方便地理解代码。

## 运算






::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
1+2
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 3
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
1-2
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] -1
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
1/2
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 0.5
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
1*2
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 2
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
2^3 # 3次方
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 8
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
5 %/% 2 #取商
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 2
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
5 %% 2 #取余
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 1
```


:::
:::






## 判断






::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
T & F  #与 and
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] FALSE
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
T || F #或 or
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] TRUE
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
!T #非 not
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] FALSE
```


:::
:::






## 取子集

`[]` 取向量中的某些元素,起始为1






::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
month.abb
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1] "Jan" "Feb" "Mar" "Apr" "May" "Jun" "Jul" "Aug" "Sep" "Oct" "Nov" "Dec"
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
month.abb[1]
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "Jan"
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
month.abb[c(1,3,5)]
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "Jan" "Mar" "May"
```


:::
:::






`$` 取数据框`data.frame`的某一列/取列表`list`的某一项






::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
head(mtcars)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
                   mpg cyl disp  hp drat    wt  qsec vs am gear carb
Mazda RX4         21.0   6  160 110 3.90 2.620 16.46  0  1    4    4
Mazda RX4 Wag     21.0   6  160 110 3.90 2.875 17.02  0  1    4    4
Datsun 710        22.8   4  108  93 3.85 2.320 18.61  1  1    4    1
Hornet 4 Drive    21.4   6  258 110 3.08 3.215 19.44  1  0    3    1
Hornet Sportabout 18.7   8  360 175 3.15 3.440 17.02  0  0    3    2
Valiant           18.1   6  225 105 2.76 3.460 20.22  1  0    3    1
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
class(mtcars)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "data.frame"
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
names(mtcars)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1] "mpg"  "cyl"  "disp" "hp"   "drat" "wt"   "qsec" "vs"   "am"   "gear"
[11] "carb"
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
mtcars$mpg
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1] 21.0 21.0 22.8 21.4 18.7 18.1 14.3 24.4 22.8 19.2 17.8 16.4 17.3 15.2 10.4
[16] 10.4 14.7 32.4 30.4 33.9 21.5 15.5 15.2 13.3 19.2 27.3 26.0 30.4 15.8 19.7
[31] 15.0 21.4
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ls<-list(a=1,b=month.abb)
class(ls)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "list"
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ls$b
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1] "Jan" "Feb" "Mar" "Apr" "May" "Jun" "Jul" "Aug" "Sep" "Oct" "Nov" "Dec"
```


:::
:::






`[[]]取列表某一项等`






::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ls<-list(a=1,b=month.abb)
ls[[b]]
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1] "Jan" "Feb" "Mar" "Apr" "May" "Jun" "Jul" "Aug" "Sep" "Oct" "Nov" "Dec"
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ls[[2]]
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
 [1] "Jan" "Feb" "Mar" "Apr" "May" "Jun" "Jul" "Aug" "Sep" "Oct" "Nov" "Dec"
```


:::
:::
